name: 16 aspects
description:
16 aspects - Everyone loves a board game, this is a board game that allows you to dive into four different locations, your task is to collect pieces of music from chests so that in the end you can collect your song.

This is a local co-op game for two players, with interchangeable locations and music, the first one to complete their track wins. 

The game is called 16 Aspects because if you combine small pieces of music, you can collect 16 different songs.

The game was made in 48 hours on magejam-vol-v.
Theam: Impact
The game was made on March 6, 2022. Programmer, Game Design, Level Design:
Dzianis “soyuz” Yurkou

God of music, Game Design:
Arsenii "Chillkiddy" Kropotov
 P.S. WebGL do not support dynamic streaming music, if you want to listen final combine music, play in PC!
